main.name: I'm Danyls Ngongang.
main.description: I'm a computer science student  based in Aachen in Germany, currently i'am a bachelor student at the RWTH Aachen university. And also a junior web developer
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding.  Arriving in Germany since 2018, I am currently a 2nd year student in computer science. In addition to my studies I use my free time to learn new technology independently. Thanks to this autonomy I was able to get a job as a working student during my first semester at university and to gain knowledge in data science.  However my love is not in data science but in web and mobile development.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: Here are some technologies that i use or have already use

education.description: After arriving in Germany I absolutely wanted to study at an elite university so that I could have the chance and the opportunity to study with some of the best minds in Germany and after several researches I came across the RWTH which is one of the elite universities in Germany. I am currently in the 3rd semester with a focus on software engineering.

work.title: Working Student
work.description: Working at ISEA allowed me to understand and see how work in a company is organized and structured. During my stay at ISEA I mainly worked as a working student.During my work at ISEA I was mainly in charge of extracting the data from the measurements on the batteries and then representing these data in order to facilitate their exploitation. I really enjoyed my work at ISEA because of its diversity. For example, one of the last tasks I had to do was to build a neural network, an LSTM to be more precise, in order to discover the physical factors that most impact the aging of Lithium-ion Batteries. And so I was able to acquire basic knowledge in Data science and artificial intelligence.During my work there I used Matlab and Python for all my tasks.
